text: TIffany Haddish made history last night as the first African - American female comedian to host the long - running sketch show Saturday Night Live on Saturday. The comedienne shined through the opening monologue and throughout the episode in her history - making hosting gig. This was the first time a black female stand - up comic has hosted the show in 43 seasons.
